mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_base_role_resource (role_id, resource_id) select (select id from t_base_role where code = '101'), #{id} from dual WHERE NOT EXISTS (select * from t_base_role_resource where role_id=(select id from t_base_role where code = '101') and resource_id = #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, pId, type, uri, permission, enabled, PROJECT_NO, sort, icon, remarks, COMPONENT_NAME FROM t_base_resource a JOIN t_base_role_resource b ON a.id = b.resource_id WHERE b.role_id = #{roleId} AND a.ENABLED = 1 ORDER BY a.sort

WHERE name like '%' || #{name} || '%'
